# maximumItemCount

**Type Property**

The maximum number of items, across all sections, that the template can display.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var maximumItemCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This property’s value is dependent on any user interface limits that the vehicle imposes. See [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPSessionConfiguration] for more information. At runtime, use this value to determine the maximum number of items, across all sections, that your list can display.

## Getting Supplementary Information

- **itemCount**: The total number of items, across all sections, in the list.
- **indexPath(for:)**: Returns the index path for the specified item.
- **title**: The title that the navigation bar displays when the template is visible.
